resources.string: Wow… such emptiness. Start adding quotes to have them show up in your favorites list

Carpe Diem is a Latin aphorism translated as SEIZE THE DAY!
Use the motivation in these daily quotes to seize the day and bring the best in you!
Maecenas vehicula eros sem, quis tristique ipsum condimentum vitae. Pellentesque in molestie tortor. Ut congue congue neque at consectetu
